amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit any public housing agency from evicting a family solely on the basis of a failure to comply with community work requirements.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 8 in the Congressional Record of April 29, 1997, to delete provisions in the bill requiring Public Housing tenants to enter into community service contracts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson (IL) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 251 (Roll no. 100).
